column4: How do I get rid of a plugin in firefox that I don't want and replace it with one I do want? I accidentally installed a different plugin instead of flash and this plugin doesn't work with all of the sites flash did
the problem is that the shockwave flash 9.0 isn't working properly
no matter what site I go to that has flash on it, it makes me click a little play button in a circle and for some sites I click it but then it just goes black (ustream.tv for example)
You might have the mozilla-plugin-gnash package installed...which is an alternantive flash plugin. Try apt-get remove mozilla-plugin-gnash
thingy ok, I did that; now what?
thingy no, it went through a process, but then it said 0 installed 0 removed and so on
but I could've sworn that or something like that is what I have installed
can you copy and paste into pastebin the contents of your mozilla's about:plugins page?
doh...i meant about : plugins page <-- turned it into a smiley
http://pastebin.com/m6de68300 (I won't respond for a while because I have to leave for about 10 min but I will be back... please don't leave!)
Priv msg me when you get back
